element.name: accessConsts
element.label: Erişim Kısıtları
element.description: Erişim kısıtları, ticari marka ve kullanım haklarının güvencesi ile birlikte herhangi bir kaynaga erişim ile ilgili kısıtları tanımlar

element.name: Address
element.label: Adres
element.description: organizasyonun veya location of the responsible individual or organization

element.name: adminArea
element.label: Yönetimsel Alan
element.description: İl, ilçe konumu

element.name: appProfile
element.label: Uygulama Profili
element.description: çevrim içi veri kaynağı ile kullanılabilecek uygulama progilinin ismi

element.name: AppSchInfo
element.label: Uygulama Şeması Bilgisi
element.description: veri setini oluşturmak için kullanılan uygulama şeması hakkında bilgi

element.name: appSchInfo
element.label: Uygulama Şeması Bilgi
element.description: Veri seti şemasının kavrsamsal bilgisi

element.name: artPage
element.label: Sayfa
element.description: yayının veya makalenin hangi sayfasının yayınlandığını gösterir sayfa

element.name: asAscii
element.label: ASCII ŞemaschemaAscii
element.description: ASCII formda tam uygulama şeması

element.name: asCstLang
element.label: Uygulama Şeması Dili
element.description: Uygulama Şeması Dili

element.name: asGraFile
element.label: Grafik Dosya
element.description: Uygulama şemasının grafik dosyası

element.name: asName
element.label: İsim
element.description: Uygulama şemasının ismi

element.name: asSchLang
element.label: Şema dili
element.description: şema dilinin tanımı

element.name: asSwDevFiFt
element.label: Yazılım Geliştirme dosya formatı
element.description: uygulama şemasının yazılım bağımlı dosyasının formatı

element.name: asSwDevFile
element.label: Yazılım Geliştirme Dosyası
element.description: Uygulama şemasının yazılım geliştirme dili formatındaki dosyası

element.name: attDesc
element.label: Öznitelik Tanımları
element.description: ölçüm değerleri ile tanımlanmış olan özniteliklerin tanımları

element.name: attribIntSet
element.label: Öznitelik örnekleri
element.description: bilgilerin uygulanması için kullanılan öznitelik örnekleri

element.name: attribSet
element.label: Öz Nitelikler
element.description: Bilginin uygulanacağu öznitelikler

element.name: axDimProps
element.label: Eksen buyotları özellikleri
element.description: mekansal geçici eksenlerin özellikleri hakkında bilgi

element.name: axisUnits
element.label: Eksen Parçaları
element.description: units of the semi-major axis

element.name: aziAngle
element.label: Azimut Açısı
element.description: Azimut Açısı

element.name: aziPtLong
element.label: Azimut Ölçüm Noktası Boylamı
element.description: longitude of the map projection origin

element.name: Band
element.label: Bant
element.description: Elektomagnetik dağılımda dalga boylarının dizimi

element.name: begin
element.label: Başlangıç Tarihi
element.description: Uygunluk periyodunun başlangıç tarihi

element.name: bgFileDesc
element.label: Dosya Tanımı
element.description: Dosyanın metinsel tanımı

element.name: bgFileName
element.label: Dosya İsmi
element.description: veri setinin dosyasının ismi

element.name: bgFileType
element.label: Dosya Türü
element.description: Dosyanın format türüformat in which the illustration is encoded

element.name: bitsPerVal
element.label: Bits per value
element.description: maximum number of significant bits in the uncompressed representation for the value in each band of each pixel

element.name: BoundPoly
element.label: EX_BoundingPolygon
element.description: boundary enclosing the dataset, expressed as the closed set of (x,y) coordinates of the polygon (last point replicates first point)

element.name: BrowGraph
element.label: MD_BrowseGraphic
element.description: graphic that provides an illustration of the dataset (should include a legend for the graphic)

element.name: camCalInAv
element.label: Kamera Kalibrasyon bilgileri Uygunluğu
element.description: indication of whether or not constants are available which allow for camera calibration corrections

element.name: catCitation
element.label: Feature kataloğuna atıf
element.description: complete bibliographic reference to one or more external feature catalogues

element.name: catLang
element.label: Dil
element.description: Katalogda kullanılan dil

element.name: cellGeo
element.label: Hücre Geometrisi
element.description: Nokta veya hücre olarak girid verisinin tanımı

element.name: centerPt
element.label: Merkez nokta
element.description: earth location in the coordinate system defined by the Spatial Reference System and the grid coordinate of the cell halfway between opposite ends of the grid in the spatial dimensions

element.name: chkPtAv
element.label: Kontrol Noktası Uygunluğu
element.description: Georeferanslanmış grid verinin doğruluğunun testi için coğrafi konumlu noktaların uygunluğunun belirtilmesi

element.name: chkPtDesc
element.label: Kontrol Noktası Tanımı
element.description: description of geographic position points used to test the accuracy of the georeferenced grid data

element.name: Citation
element.label: Standart Kaynak Ref
element.description: Standartlaştırılmış kaynak referansı

element.name: citId
element.label: Belirteç
element.description: Kaynağın tekil belirteci. Örnek: Uluslararası ürün kodu (UPC) veya Ulusal Stock Numarası (NSN)

element.name: citIdType
element.label: BelirteçTipi
element.description: Tekil belirtecin referans formu. Örnek: Uluslararası ürün kodu (UPC) veya Ulusal Stock Numarası (NSN)

element.name: citRespParty
element.label: Sorumlu Taraf
element.description: veri kaynağından sorumlu tarafın isim ve konum bilgisi

element.name: city
element.label: Şehir
element.description: Konumun şehir bilgisi

element.name: class
element.label: Sınıf
element.description: kaynak üzerindeki kısıtlamaların isimleri

element.name: classSys
element.label: Sınıflandırma Sistemi
element.description: Sınıflandırma sisteminin ismi

element.name: cloudCovPer
element.label: Bulutluluk Oranı
element.description: Mekansal uzaklığına yüzdelenmiş anlatımı ile bulutla kapalı alan oranı

element.name: cmpGenQuan
element.label: Compression generation quantity
element.description: count of the number of lossy compression cycles performed on the image

element.name: cntAddress
element.label: Adres
element.description: Organizasyona erişim için fiziksel ve e-posta adresi

element.name: cntHours
element.label: Servis saatleri
element.description: Organizasyonun erişilebildiği saatler

element.name: cntInstr
element.label: Erişim şekli ve şartları
element.description: Organizasyona erişim için tarifler

element.name: cntPhone
element.label: Telefon
element.description: Organizasyona erişim için Telefon Numarası

element.name: collTitle
element.label: Collective title
element.description: common title with holdings note. NOTE title identifies elements of a series collectively, combined with information about what volumes are available at the source cited

element.name: compCode
element.label: Compliance code
element.description: indication of whether or not the cited feature catalogue complies with ISO 19110

element.name: conExpl
element.label: Açıklama
element.description: explanation of the meaning of conformance for this result

element.name: conPass
element.label: Geçiş (Pass)
element.description: indication of the conformance result where 0 = fail and 1 = pass

element.name: ConResult
element.label: Uyumluluk sonucu
element.description: elde edilen değerin kabul edilebilir kalite uygunluk seviyesi hakkında bilgi

element.name: conSpec
element.label: Özellikler
element.description: hangi verinin değerlendirildiğine bağlı olarak ürünün özelliklerine atfen

element.name: Consts
element.label: Kısıtlar
element.description: Kaynağı veya kaynağın metaverisini kullanma veya erişimi ile ilgili kısıtlar

element.name: contentTyp
element.label: İçerik tipi
element.description: hücre değeri tarafından simgelenen bilgi

element.name: ContInfo
element.label: İçerik Bilgisi
element.description: veri setinin içeriğinin tanımı

element.name: contInfo
element.label: İçerik Bilgi
element.description: feature katalogu hakkında bilgi verme ve resim ve coverage verileri tanımlama

element.name: cornerPts
element.label: Köşe Noktaları
element.description: earth location in the coordinate system defined by the Spatial Reference System and the grid coordinate of the cells at opposite ends of grid coverage along two diagonals in the grid spatial dimensions. There are four corner points in a georectified grid; at least two corner points along one diagonal are required

element.name: country
element.label: Ülke
element.description: Fiziksel adresde belirtilen ülke

element.name: CovDesc
element.label: Kapsama Tanımı
element.description: information about the content of a grid data cell

element.name: covDim
element.label: Boyut
element.description: information on the dimensions of the cell measurement value

element.name: ctrlPtAv
element.label: Kontrol Noktası Uygunluğu
element.description: indication of whether or not control point(s) exists

element.name: dataChar
element.label: Karakter seti
element.description: Veri setinde kullanılan karakter setini tam ismi

element.name: dataExt
element.label: Kapsam-Extent
element.description: Sınırlama poligonu dahil dikey ve geçici kapsamdaki veri setinin kapsamı, extent

element.name: DataIdent
element.label: Veri Tanımlama
element.description: veri setini tanımlamak için kullanılan bilgi

element.name: dataIdInfo
element.label: Tanımlama Bilgisi
element.description: metaverinin uygulandığı veri seti ile ilgili temel bilgiler

element.name: dataLang
element.label: Dil
element.description: veri seti içinde kullanılan diller

element.name: dataLineage
element.label: Lineage
element.description: non-quantitative quality information about the lineage of the data specified by the scope

element.name: DataQual
element.label: Veri Kalitesi
element.description: kalite yaklaşımı tanımlanmış olan verinin kalite bilgisi

element.name: dataScale
element.label: Mekansal Çözünürlük
element.description: mekansal verinin yoğunluğu ile ilgili fikir veren faktör bilgisi

element.name: datasetSeries
element.label: Seriler
element.description: veri setleri veya bileşik veri setleri için hangi veri setinin parça olduğunu gösteren bilgi

element.name: DatasetSeries
element.label: Seriler
element.description: information about the series, or aggregate dataset, to which a dataset belongs

element.name: datasetSet
element.label: Dataset Set
element.description: dataset to which the information applies

element.name: dataSource
element.label: Kaynak
element.description: hedefde belirtilmiş olan verinin türetildiği kaynak verinin bilgileri

element.name: dateNext
element.label: Bir sonraki güncelleme tarihi
element.description: veri kaynağının planlanmış revizyon tarihi (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: DateRef
element.label: Gün
element.description: reference date and event used to describe it (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: datum
element.label: Datum
element.description: Kullanılan Datumun adı

element.name: delPoint
element.label: Dağıtım Noktası
element.description: Konumun adres bilgisi(ISO 11180, Ek A da tanımladığı gibi)

element.name: denFlatRat
element.label: Denominator of flattening ratio
element.description: ratio of the difference between the equatorial and polar radii of the ellipsoid to the equatorial radius when the numerator is set to 1

element.name: descKeys
element.label: Descriptive keywords
element.description: provides category keywords, their type, and reference source

element.name: DigTranOps
element.label: Sayısal çevrim seçenekleri
element.description: technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

element.name: dimDescrp
element.label: Descriptor
element.description: description of the range of a cell measurement value

element.name: Dimen
element.label: Boyut
element.description: axis properties

element.name: dimName
element.label: Boyut adı
element.description: name of the axis

element.name: dimResol
element.label: Çözünürlük
element.description: degree of detail in the grid dataset

element.name: dimSize
element.label: Eksendeki element Sayısı
element.description: number of elements along the axis

element.name: distInfo
element.label: Yayınlayıcı Bilgisi
element.description: provides information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource(s)

element.name: distorCont
element.label: Yayınlayıcı Erişim
element.description: party from whom the resource may be obtained. This list need not be exhaustive

element.name: distorFormat
element.label: Yayınlayıcı format
element.description: provides information about the format used by the distributor

element.name: distorOrdPrc
element.label: Yayın sipariş süreci
element.description: provides information about how the resource may be obtained, and related instructions and fee information

element.name: Distrib
element.label: Yayın
element.description: information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource

element.name: Distributor
element.label: Dağıtıcı
element.description: information about the distributor

element.name: distributor
element.label: Yayınlayan
element.description: provides information about the distributor

element.name: distTranOps
element.label: Çevrim seçenekleri
element.description: provides information about technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

element.name: DQAbsExtPosAcc
element.label: Kesin dış pozisyon doğruluğu-Absolute external positional accuracy
element.description: closeness of reported coordinate values to values accepted as or being true

element.name: DQAccTimeMeas
element.label: Zaman ölçümü doğruluğu
element.description: correctness of the temporal references of an item (reporting of error in time measurement)

element.name: DQCompComm
element.label: Veri Amaçdaki Doluluktamı
element.description: excess data present in the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: DQCompOm
element.label: Veri Noksanlığı amaçtaki ile aynımı
element.description: data absent from the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: DQConcConsis
element.label: Conceptual consistency
element.description: adherence to rules of the conceptual schema

element.name: DQDomConsis
element.label: Domain consistency
element.description: adherence of values to the value domains

element.name: DQFormConsis
element.label: Format kısıtları
element.description: degree to which data is stored in accordance with the physical structure of the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: DQGridDataPosAcc
element.label: Gridlenmiş verinin konumsal doğruluğu
element.description: closeness of gridded data position values to values accepted as or being true

element.name: dqInfo
element.label: Veri Kalitesi Bilgisi
element.description: provides overall assessment of quality of a resource(s)

element.name: DQNonQuanAttAcc
element.label: Niteliksel öznitelik doğruluğu
element.description: niteliksel özniteliklerin doğruluk derecesi

element.name: DQQuanAttAcc
element.label: Niceliksel öznitelik doğruluğu
element.description: accuracy of quantitative attributes

element.name: DQRelIntPosAcc
element.label: Göreceli içsel konum doğruluğu
element.description: closeness of the relative positions of features in the scope to their respective relative positions accepted as or being true

element.name: dqReport
element.label: Raporlar
element.description: quantitative quality information for the data specified by the scope

element.name: DQScope
element.label: Amacı
element.description: description of the data specified by the scope

element.name: dqScope
element.label: Scope
element.description: Veri kalite bilgisinin uygulandığı özel veri

element.name: DQTempConsis
element.label: Geçici Tutarlılık
element.description: correctness of ordered events or sequences, if reported

element.name: DQTempValid
element.label: Geçici Uygunluk-Temporal validity
element.description: validity of data specified by the scope with respect to time

element.name: DQThemClassCor
element.label: Tematik sınıflandırma doğruluğu
element.description: comparison of the classes assigned to features or their attributes to a universe of discourse

element.name: DQTopConsis
element.label: Topolojik tutarlılık
element.description: correctness of the explicitly encoded topological characteristics of the dataset as described by the scope

element.name: dsFormat
element.label: Kaynak Formatı
element.description: provides a description of the format of the resource(s)

element.name: eastBL
element.label: Doğu boylamı-East bound longitude
element.description: eastern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: ellipsoid
element.label: Elipsoid
element.description: Kullanılan Elipsoid

element.name: ellParas
element.label: Elipsoid Parametreleri
element.description: set of parameters that describe the ellipsoid

element.name: EllParas
element.label: Ellipsoid Parametreleri
element.description: set of parameters that describe the ellipsoid

element.name: eMailAdd
element.label: E-Posta adresi
element.description: organizasyon veya bireyin e-posta adresi

element.name: end
element.label: Son tarih
element.description: Uygunluk periyodunun son günü

element.name: envirDesc
element.label: Environment description
element.description: description of the dataset in the producer_s processing environment, including items such as the software, the computer operating system, file name, and the dataset size

element.name: equScale
element.label: Equivalent scale
element.description: level of detail expressed as the scale of a comparable hardcopy map or chart

element.name: errStat
element.label: Error statistic
element.description: statistical method used to determine the value

element.name: evalMethDesc
element.label: Evaluation method description
element.description: description of the evaluation method

element.name: evalMethType
element.label: Evaluation method type code
element.description: type of method used to evaluate quality of the dataset

element.name: exDesc
element.label: Tanım
element.description: spatial and temporal extent for the referring object

element.name: exSpat
element.label: Spatial extent
element.description: spatial extent component of composite spatial and temporal extent

element.name: extEleCond
element.label: Durum
element.description: hangi elemanın zorunlu oldugu durumu

element.name: extEleDef
element.label: Tanım
element.description: extent edilmiş elementin in tanımı

element.name: extEleDomVal
element.label: Değerleri
element.description: extent edilmiş elemente atanan geçerli değerler

element.name: ExtEleInfo
element.label: MetaVeri Bilgi
element.description: coğrafi veriyi tanımlamak için ihtiyaç hissedilen yeni metaveri elemanı (ISO 19115 de bulunamaz ise)

element.name: extEleInfo
element.label: Metaveri Bilgi
element.description: coğrafi veriyi tanımlamak için ihtiyaç hissedilen yeni metaveri elemanı (ISO 19115 de bulunamaz ise)

element.name: extEleMxOc
element.label: Maximum occurrence
element.description: Extent edilmiş elementin en fazla kullanımı

element.name: extEleName
element.label: İsim
element.description: extent edilmiş elementin ismi

element.name: extEleOb
element.label: Zorunluluk
element.description: extent edilmiş elementin zorunluluğu

element.name: extEleParEnt
element.label: Parent entity
element.description: name of the metadata entity(s) under which this extended metadata element may appear. The name(s) may be standard metadata element(s) or other extended metadata element(s).

element.name: extEleRat
element.label: Gerekçe
element.description: extent edilmiş elementin oluşma gerekçesi

element.name: extEleRule
element.label: Kural
element.description: extent edilmiş elementin diğer mevcut elementlerle nasıl bir ilişkide olduğu ile ilgili kurallar

element.name: extEleSrc
element.label: Oluşturan
element.description: extent elemanı oluşturan organizasyon veya kişinin ismi

element.name: exTemp
element.label: Tarih Saat
element.description: veri setinin içeriği için tarih ve saat bilgisi

element.name: Extent
element.label: Kapsam-Extent
element.description: mekansal, dikey ve geçici eklentiler için bilgi

element.name: extOnRes
element.label: Uzantı çevrim içi kaynağı
element.description: information about on-line sources containing the community profile name and the extended metadata elements. Information for all new metadata elements

element.name: extShortName
element.label: Kısa ismi
element.description: short form suitable for use in an implementation method such as XML or SGML. NOTE other methods may be used

element.name: exTypeCode
element.label: Kapsam tip kodu
element.description: indication of whether the bounding polygon encompasses an area covered by the data or an area where data is not present

element.name: falEastng
element.label: X-doğu değeri düzeltmesi-False easting
element.description: harita projeksiyonu için bütün x değerlerine eklenen değer

element.name: falENUnits
element.label: Kuzey doğu düzeltme birimi
element.description: kuzey ve doğu düzeltme değeri birimi

element.name: falNorthng
element.label: Y-Kuzey değeri düzeltmesi-False northing
element.description: bütün y değerlerine eklenen harita projesikyonu düzeltme değeri

element.name: faxNum
element.label: Fax Numarası
element.description: sorumlu kurum veya kuruluşun fax numarası

element.name: featIntSet
element.label: Feature Örnekleri
element.description: feature instances to which the information applies

element.name: featSet
element.label: Features
element.description: features to which the information applies

element.name: featTypeList
element.label: Feature tür listesi
element.description: provides information about the list of feature types with the same spatial representation

element.name: FeatTypList
element.label: Feature Tip Listesi
element.description: list of names of feature types with the same spatial representation (same as spatial attributes)

element.name: FetCatDesc
element.label: Feature Katalog tanımı
element.description: information identifying the feature catalogue

element.name: fileDecmTech
element.label: Dosya sıkıştırma tekniği
element.description: recommendations of algorithms or processes that can be applied to read or expand resources to which compression techniques have been applied

element.name: filmDistInAv
element.label: Film deformasyon bilgisi uygunluğu
element.description: indication of whether or not Calibration Reseau information is available

element.name: Format
element.label: Format
element.description: description of the computer language construct that specifies the representation of data objects in a record, file, message, storage device or transmission channel

element.name: formatAmdNum
element.label: Düzeltme Numarası
element.description: format versiyonunun düzeltme numarası

element.name: formatName
element.label: İsim
element.description: veri transfer formatının ismi

element.name: formatSpec
element.label: Özellikler
element.description: formatın alt seti, profili veya ürün özellikleri

element.name: formatVer
element.label: Versiyon
element.description: formatin versiyonu tarih, numara vb

element.name: GeoBndBox
element.label: Coğrafi sınırlandırma kutusu-bounding box
element.description: veri setinin coğrafi konumu

element.name: geoBox
element.label: Min. Coğrafi Dikdörtgen
element.description: uygun olan veri için minimum coğrafi seçim dikdörtgeni

element.name: geoDesc
element.label: Coğrafi tanımı
element.description: uygun olan veri için coğrafi alan tanımı

element.name: GeoDesc
element.label: Coğrafi tanımı-Belirteç
element.description: belirteçler kullanarak coğrafi alanın tanımlanması

element.name: geoEle
element.label: Coğrafi element
element.description: provides geographic component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: geoId
element.label: Coğrafi belirteç
element.description: identifier used to represent a geographic area

element.name: geometObjs
element.label: Geometri objesi
element.description: veri seti içinde kullanılan geometri objesinin bilgisi

element.name: GeometObjs
element.label: Geometri objesi sayısı
element.description: veri seti içinde kullanılan objelerin geometri tipine göre sıralanmış sayıları

element.name: geoObjCnt
element.label: Geometrik obje sayısı
element.description: toplam nokta veya vektör obje sayısı

element.name: geoObjTyp
element.label: Geometrik obje tipi
element.description: name of point and vector spatial objects used to locate zero-, one-, and two-dimensional spatial locations in the dataset

element.name: Georect
element.label: Coğrafi koordinatlandırılmış
element.description: grid whose cells are regularly spaced in a geographic (i.e., lat / long) or map coordinate system defined in the Spatial Referencing System (SRS) so that any cell in the grid can be geolocated given its grid coordinate and the grid origin, cell spacing, and orientation

element.name: Georef
element.label: Georeferenceable
element.description: grid with cells irregularly spaced in any given geographic/map projection coordinate system, whose individual cells can be geolocated using geolocation information supplied with the data but cannot be geolocated from the grid properties alone

element.name: georefPars
element.label: Koordinatlandırma Parametreleri
element.description: grid veriyi koordinatlandırma parametreleri

element.name: graphOver
element.label: Grafik Üst Görünüm
element.description: provides a graphic that illustrates the resource(s) (should include a legend for the graphic)

element.name: GridSpatRep
element.label: Grid spatial representation
element.description: information about grid spatial objects in the dataset

element.name: handDesc
element.label: Handling description
element.description: additional information about the restrictions on handling the resource

element.name: hgtProsPt
element.label: Height of prospective point above surface
element.description: height of viewpoint above the Earth, expressed in metres

element.name: idAbs
element.label: Özet
element.description: kaynağın içeriğini anlatan kısa özet

element.name: idCitation
element.label: Atıf
element.description: citation data for the resource(s)

element.name: idCredit
element.label: Credit***
element.description: kaynağın oluşmasına finans ve üretim katkısı sağlayanlar

element.name: identAuth
element.label: Merci
element.description: person or party responsible for maintenance of the namespace

element.name: identCode
element.label: Kod
element.description: alphanumeric value identifying an instance in the namespace

element.name: idPoC
element.label: İrtibat bilgisi
element.description: identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations(s) associated with the resource(s)

element.name: idPurp
element.label: Amaç
element.description: kaynağın üretilme amacı ile ilgili kısa açıklama

element.name: idSpecUse
element.label: Kaynağın temel kullanımı
element.description: provides basic information about specific application(s) for which the resource(s) has/have been or is being used by different users

element.name: illAziAng
element.label: Azimut açısı bilgilendirmesi
element.description: illumination azimuth measured in degrees clockwise from true north at the time the image is taken. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

element.name: illElevAng
element.label: Yükseklik açısı bilgilenmesi
element.description: illumination elevation measured in degrees clockwise from the target plane at intersection of the optical line of sight with the Earth_s surface. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

element.name: imagCond
element.label: Görüntü etkileyen durumlar
element.description: Görüntü etkileyen durumlar

element.name: imagQuCode
element.label: Görüntü kalite kodu
element.description: görüntü kalitesini belirtir

element.name: ImgDesc
element.label: Görüntü kullanım durumu açıklaması
element.description: Görüntü kullanım durumu açıklaması

element.name: incWithDS
element.label: Katalog veri seti icindemi?
element.description: feature katalogu veri setinde tanımlımı degilmi

element.name: isbn
element.label: ISBN
element.description: uluslararası standart kitap numarası

element.name: issId
element.label: Yayın belirtmesi
element.description: serinin yayın bilgisi

element.name: issn
element.label: ISSN
element.description: uluslararası standart seri numarası

element.name: keyTyp
element.label: Tür
element.description: subject matter used to group similar keywords

element.name: keyword
element.label: Keyword
element.description: commonly used word(s) or formalised word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the subject

element.name: Keywords
element.label: Keywords
element.description: keywords, their type and reference source

element.name: latProjCnt
element.label: Projeksiyon merkezinin boylamı-azimuthal
element.description: latitude of the point of projection for azimuthal projections

element.name: latProjOri
element.label: Projeksiyon orjininin boylamı
element.description: latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection

element.name: LegConsts
element.label: Hukuksal kısıtlar
element.description: veriye erişim ve kullanımla ilgili hukuksal kısıtlar ve sınırlandırmalar

element.name: lensDistInAv
element.label: Lens bozukluğu bilgisine erişim uygunluğu
element.description: indication of whether or not lens aberration correction information is available

element.name: Lineage
element.label: Lineage
element.description: information about the events or source data used in constructing the data specified by the scope or lack of knowledge about lineage

element.name: linkage
element.label: Bağlantı-Köprü
element.description: location (address) for on-line access using a Uniform Resource Locator address or similar addressing scheme such as http://www.statkart.no/isotc211

element.name: longCntMer
element.label: Merkez meridyenin boylamı
element.description: line of longitude at the centre of a map projection generally used as the basis for constructing the projection

element.name: longProjCnt
element.label: Projeksiyon merkezinin boylamı
element.description: longitude of the point of projection for azimuthal projections

element.name: maintFreq
element.label: İdame ve güncelleme sıklığı
element.description: frequency with which changes and additions are made to the resource after the initial resource is completed

element.name: MaintInfo
element.label: Güncelleme-İdame bilgisi
element.description: information about the scope and frequency of updating

element.name: maintNote
element.label: Güncelleme-İdame notu
element.description: information regarding specific requirements for maintaining the resource

element.name: maintScp
element.label: Güncelleme amacı
element.description: scope of data to which maintenance is applied

element.name: maxVal
element.label: Üst Değer
element.description: longest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band

element.name: mdChar
element.label: Karakter seti
element.description: full name of the character coding standard used for the metadata set

element.name: mdConst
element.label: Metaveri kısıtları
element.description: veriye erişim ve kullanım kısıtlarının bilgileri

element.name: mdContact
element.label: Metaveri sahibi
element.description: party responsible for the metadata information

element.name: MdCoRefSys
element.label: Koordinat referans sistemi
element.description: metadata about a coordinate system in which attributes have been derived from SC_CRS as defined in ISO 19111 _ Spatial referencing by coordinates

element.name: mdDateSt
element.label: Metaveri Üretim Tarihi
element.description: date that the metadata was created (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: mdExtInfo
element.label: Metaveri uzantısı bilgisi
element.description: Metaveri uzantısı bilgisi

element.name: MdExtInfo
element.label: Metaveri uzantısı bilgisi
element.description: Metaveri uzantısı bilgisi

element.name: mdFileID
element.label: Metaveri Dosya Belirteci
element.description: metaveri dosyası belirteci

element.name: mdHrLv
element.label: Metaveri Hiyerarşi Seviyesi
element.description: scope to which the metadata applies (see annex H for more information about metadata hierarchy levels)

element.name: mdHrLvName
element.label: Metaveri Hiyerarşi Adı
element.description: name of the hierarchy levels for which the metadata is provided

element.name: MdIdent
element.label: Belirteç
element.description: value uniquely identifying an object within a namespace

element.name: mdLang
element.label: Metaveri Dili
element.description: language used for documenting metadata

element.name: mdMaint
element.label: Metaveri güncelliği
element.description: provides information about the frequency of metadata updates, and the scope of those updates

element.name: mdParentID
element.label: Ebeveyn belirteci
element.description: file identifier of the metadata to which this metadata is a subset (child)

element.name: mdStanName
element.label: Metaveri standart ismi-profil adı
element.description: name of the metadata standard (including profile name) used

element.name: mdStanVer
element.label: Metaveri kullanılan standart
element.description: version (profile) of the metadata standard used

element.name: measDateTm
element.label: Tarih Saat
element.description: date or range of dates on which a data quality measure was applied (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: measId
element.label: Standart Prosedur Kodu
element.description: code identifying a registered standard procedure

element.name: measName
element.label: Veri Test adı
element.description: veriye uygulanan testin adi

element.name: measResult
element.label: Sonuç
element.description: value (or set of values) obtained from applying a data quality measure or the out come of evaluating the obtained value (or set of values) against a specified acceptable conformance quality level

element.name: medDensity
element.label: Yoğunluk
element.description: kaydedilen verinin yogunlugu

element.name: medDenUnits
element.label: Yog. Ölçüm Birimi
element.description: kaydedilen yogunlugun ölçümünde kullanılan birim

element.name: medFormat
element.label: Medium format
element.description: method used to write to the medium

element.name: Medium
element.label: Medium
element.description: information about the media on which the resource can be distributed

element.name: medName
element.label: İsim
element.description: name of the medium on which the resource can be received

element.name: medNote
element.label: Medium note
element.description: description of other limitations or requirements for using the medium

element.name: medVol
element.label: Volumes
element.description: number of items in the media identified

element.name: Metadata
element.label: Metaveri
element.description: root entity which defines metadata about a resource or resources

element.name: minVal
element.label: Alt değer
element.description: shortest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band

element.name: northBL
element.label: North bound latitude
element.description: northern-most, coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: numDims
element.label: Eksen sayısı-Number of dimensions
element.description: number of independent spatial-temporal axes

element.name: ObLineAzi
element.label: Oblique line azimuth
element.description: method used to describe the line along which an oblique mercator map projection is centred using the map projection origin and an azimuth

element.name: obLineLat
element.label: Oblique line latitude
element.description: latitude of a point defining the oblique line

element.name: obLineLong
element.label: Oblique line longitude
element.description: longitude of a point defining the oblique line

element.name: ObLinePt
element.label: Oblique line point
element.description: method used to describe the line along which an oblique mercator map projection is centred using two points near the limits of the mapped region that define the centre line

element.name: obLnAziPars
element.label: Oblique line azimuth parameter
element.description: parameters describing the oblique line azimuth

element.name: obLnPtPars
element.label: Oblique line point parameter
element.description: parameters describing the oblique line point

element.name: offset
element.label: Offset
element.description: the physical value corresponding to a cell value of zero

element.name: OnlineRes
element.label: Online resource
element.description: information about on-line sources from which the dataset, specification, or community profile name and extended metadata elements can be obtained

element.name: onLineSrc
element.label: OnLine resource
element.description: information about online sources from which the resource can be obtained

element.name: orDesc
element.label: Description
element.description: detailed text description of what the online resource is/does

element.name: ordInstr
element.label: Ordering instructions
element.description: general instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor

element.name: ordTurn
element.label: Dönüş Süresi
element.description: talebin karşılanması için geçen dönüş süresi

element.name: orFunct
element.label: Fonksiyon
element.description: çevrim içi code for function performed by the online resource

element.name: orieParaAv
element.label: Oryantasyon parametreleri uygunluğu
element.description: oryantasyon parametrelerinin uygunluğu

element.name: orName
element.label: İsim
element.description: Çevrim içi kaynak ismi

element.name: othConsts
element.label: Diğer Kısıtlar
element.description: kaynaga erişim ve kullanım da diğer kısıtlar

element.name: other
element.label: Diğer
element.description: class of information that does not fall into the other categories to which the information applies

element.name: otherCitDet
element.label: Other citation details
element.description: other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere

element.name: paraCit
element.label: Parametre atfı
element.description: reference providing description of the parameters

element.name: pkResp
element.label: Peak response
element.description: wavelength at which the response is the highest

element.name: planAvDtTm
element.label: Planlanan uygun tarih saat
element.description: date and time when the dataset will be available (CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: polygon
element.label: Poligon
element.description: sets of points defining the bounding polygon

element.name: porCatInfo
element.label: Resmedilmiş Katalog Bilgisi
element.description: provides information about the catalogue of rules defined for the portrayal of a resource(s)

element.name: portCatCit
element.label: Portrayal catalogue citation
element.description: bibliographic reference to the portrayal catalogue cited

element.name: PortCatRef
element.label: Portrayal catalogue reference
element.description: information identifying the portrayal catalogue used

element.name: postCode
element.label: Posta Kodu
element.description: ZIP or other postal code

element.name: PrcessStep
element.label: İlerleme adımı
element.description: information about an event in the creation process for the data specified by the scope

element.name: prcStep
element.label: İlerleme adımı
element.description: information about an event in the creation process for the data specified by the scope

element.name: prcTypCde
element.label: İlerleme seviye kodu
element.description: image distributor_s code that identifies the level of radiometric and geometric processing that has been applied

element.name: presForm
element.label: Sunum formu
element.description: mode in which the resource is represented

element.name: projection
element.label: Projeksiyon
element.description: identity of the projection used

element.name: projParas
element.label: Projeksiyon parametreleri
element.description: set of parameters that describe the projection

element.name: ProjParas
element.label: Projeksiyon parametreleri
element.description: set of parameters that describe the projection

element.name: protocol
element.label: Bağlantı Protokolü
element.description: connection protocol to be used

element.name: ptInPixel
element.label: PointIn pixel
element.description: point in a pixel corresponding to the Earth location of the pixel

element.name: QuanResult
element.label: Kalite Ölçüm sonuçları
element.description: Information about the value (or set of values) obtained from applying a data quality measure

element.name: quanValType
element.label: Değer Tipi
element.description: value type for reporting a data quality result

element.name: quanValUnit
element.label: Değer Birimi
element.description: value unit for reporting a data quality result

element.name: radCalDatAv
element.label: Radyometrik kalibrasyon verisi uygunluğu
element.description: indication of whether or not the radiometric calibration information for generating the radiometrically calibrated standard data product is available

element.name: RangeDim
element.label: Range dimension
element.description: information on the range of each dimension of a cell measurement value

element.name: refDate
element.label: Tarih
element.description: reference date for the cited resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: refDateType
element.label: Date type
element.description: event used for reference date

element.name: refSysID
element.label: Reference system identifier
element.description: name of reference system

element.name: refSysInfo
element.label: Reference system info
element.description: description of the spatial and temporal reference systems used in the dataset

element.name: RefSystem
element.label: Reference system
element.description: information about the reference system.

element.name: RepFract
element.label: Representative fraction
element.description: derived from Scale where MD_RepresentativeFraction.denominator = 1 / Scale.measure And Scale.targetUnits = Scale.sourceUnits

element.name: resAltTitle
element.label: Alternate title
element.description: short name or other language name by which the cited information is known. Example: "DCW" as an alternative title for "Digital Chart of the World

element.name: resConst
element.label: Resource constraints
element.description: provides information about constraints which apply to the resource(s)

element.name: resEd
element.label: Kaynak Versiyonu
element.description: sözü edilen kaynağın versiyonu

element.name: resEdDate
element.label: Versiyon tarihi
element.description: date of the edition (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: resFees
element.label: Harç-Ödeme
element.description: kaynaga erisim için harç ve ödeme bilgileri. Döviz kurlarını ISO 4217 standardinda içerir

element.name: resMaint
element.label: Kaynak idamesi
element.description: provides information about the frequency of resource updates, and the scope of those updates

element.name: Resol
element.label: Çözünürlük-Ölçek
element.description: level of detail expressed as a scale factor or a ground distance

element.name: RespParty
element.label: Sorumlu Taraf
element.description: identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations associated with the dataset

element.name: resRefDate
element.label: Tarih
element.description: reference date for the cited resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: resTitle
element.label: Title
element.description: name by which the cited resource is known

element.name: Result
element.label: Result
element.description: generalization of more specific result classes

element.name: rfDenom
element.label: Denominator
element.description: the number below the line in a vulgar fraction

element.name: role
element.label: Rol
element.description: sorumlu taraf tarafından yapılan fonksiyonlar

element.name: rpCntInfo
element.label: İletişim
element.description: address of the responsible party

element.name: rpIndName
element.label: Sorumlu Kişi
element.description: name of the responsible person- surname, given name, title separated by a delimiter

element.name: rpOrgName
element.label: Organizasyon adı
element.description: name of the responsible organization

element.name: rpPosName
element.label: Görevi
element.description: role or position of the responsible person

element.name: scaleDist
element.label: Mesafe
element.description: ground sample distance

element.name: sclFac
element.label: Ölçek Faktörü
element.description: scale factor which has been applied to the cell value

element.name: sclFacCnt
element.label: Merkezdeki Ölçek Faktörü
element.description: ratio between physical distance and corresponding map distance, along the centre line

element.name: sclFacEqu
element.label: Ölçek Faktörü-ekvator
element.description: ekvatör boyunca fiziksel mesafe ve harita mesafesi oranı

element.name: sclFacPrOr
element.label: Projeksiyon Merkezi ölçek faktörü
element.description: multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling tot he actual distance at the projection origin

element.name: ScpDesc
element.label: Scope description
element.description: description of the class of information covered by the information

element.name: scpExt
element.label: Kapsam
element.description: information about the spatial, vertical and temporal extent of the data specified by the scope

element.name: scpLvl
element.label: Hiyerarşi seviyesi
element.description: hierarchical level of the data specified by the scope

element.name: scpLvlDesc
element.label: Katman tanımı
element.description: detailed description about the level of the data specified by the scope

element.name: SecConsts
element.label: Güvenlik kısıtları
element.description: handling restrictions imposed on the resource for national security or similar security concerns

element.name: semiMajAx
element.label: Semi major axis
element.description: radius of the equatorial axis of the ellipsoid

element.name: seqID
element.label: Sequence identifier
element.description: number that uniquely identifies instances of bands of wavelengths on which a sensor operates

element.name: seriesName
element.label: Name
element.description: name of the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

element.name: Source
element.label: Kaynak
element.description: information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

element.name: southBL
element.label: South bound latitude
element.description: southern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: SpatAttSup
element.label: Spatial attribute supplement
element.description: spatial attributes in the application schema for the feature types

element.name: spatObj
element.label: Spatial object
element.description: instance of a type defined in the spatial schema

element.name: spatRepInfo
element.label: Spatial representation info
element.description: digital representation of spatial information in the dataset

element.name: spatRpType
element.label: Spatial representation type
element.description: method used to spatially represent geographic information

element.name: spatSchName
element.label: Spatial schema name
element.description: name of the spatial schema used

element.name: SpatTempEx
element.label: Spatial temporal extent
element.description: extent with respect to date/time and spatial boundaries

element.name: specUsage
element.label: Specific usage
element.description: brief description of the resource and/or resource series usage

element.name: srcCitatn
element.label: Source citation
element.description: recommended reference to be used for the source data

element.name: srcDesc
element.label: Description
element.description: detailed description of the level of the source data

element.name: srcExt
element.label: Source extent
element.description: information about the spatial, vertical and temporal extent of the source data

element.name: srcRefSys
element.label: Source reference system
element.description: spatial reference system used by the source data

element.name: srcScale
element.label: Scale
element.description: denominator of the representative fraction on a source map

element.name: srcStep
element.label: Source step
element.description: information about an event in the creation process for the source data

element.name: StanOrdProc
element.label: Standard order process
element.description: common ways in which the resource may be obtained or received, and related instructions and fee information

element.name: statement
element.label: Statement
element.description: general explanation of the data producer_s knowledge about the lineage of a dataset

element.name: status
element.label: Status
element.description: status of the resource(s)

element.name: stepDateTm
element.label: Date time
element.description: date and time or range of date and time on or over which the process step occurred (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: stepDesc
element.label: Description
element.description: description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances

element.name: stepProc
element.label: Processor
element.description: identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the process step

element.name: stepRat
element.label: Rationale
element.description: requirement or purpose for the process step

element.name: stepSrc
element.label: Source
element.description: information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

element.name: stVrLongPl
element.label: Straight vertical longitude from pole
element.description: longitude to be oriented straight up from the North or South Pole

element.name: suppInfo
element.label: Supplemental Information
element.description: any other descriptive information about the dataset

element.name: Telephone
element.label: Telephone
element.description: telephone numbers for contacting the responsible individual or organization

element.name: tempEle
element.label: Temporal element
element.description: provides temporal component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: TempExtent
element.label: Temporal Extent
element.description: time period covered by the content of the dataset

element.name: thesaName
element.label: Thesaurus name
element.description: name of the formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of keywords

element.name: toneGrad
element.label: Tone gradation
element.description: number of discrete numerical values in the grid data

element.name: topLvl
element.label: Topoloji Seviyesi
element.description: mekansal ilişkilerin komplekslik derecesini tanımlayan kod

element.name: tpCat
element.label: Topic category
element.description: main theme(s) of the dataset

element.name: tranParaAv
element.label: Transformation parameter availability
element.description: indication of whether or not parameters for transformation exists

element.name: transDimDesc
element.label: Transformation dimension description
element.description: description of the information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

element.name: transDimMap
element.label: Transformation dimension mapping
element.description: information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

element.name: transSize
element.label: Transfer Boyutu
element.description: estimated size of a unit in the specified transfer format, expressed in megabytes. The transfer size is > 0.0

element.name: trianInd
element.label: Triangulation indicator
element.description: indication of whether or not triangulation has been performed upon the image

element.name: unitsODist
element.label: Units of distribution
element.description: tiles, layers, geographic areas, etc., in which data is available

element.name: upScpDesc
element.label: Update scope description
element.description: additional information about the range or extent of the resource

element.name: Usage
element.label: Kullanım
element.description: veri kaynağının kullanım yollarının kısa anlatımı

element.name: usageDate
element.label: Kullanım Tarih
element.description: date and time of the first use or range of uses of the resource and/or resource series (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: useConsts
element.label: Kısıtları kullan
element.description: constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource

element.name: useLimit
element.label: Use limitation
element.description: limitation affecting the fitness for use of the resource. Example, _not to be used for navigation_

element.name: userNote
element.label: Kullanıcı Notu
element.description: explanation of the application of the legal constraints or other restrictions and legal prerequisites for obtaining and using the resource

element.name: usrCntInfo
element.label: Kullanıcı Erişim Bilgisi
element.description: identification of and means of communicating with person(s) and organization(s) using the resource(s)

element.name: usrDefFreq
element.label: Kullanıcı Tanımlı idame sıklığıUser defined maintenance frequency
element.description: maintenance period other than those defined

element.name: usrDetLim
element.label: User determined limitations
element.description: applications, determined by the user for which the resource and/or resource series is not suitable

element.name: valUnit
element.label: Unit Değeri unit
element.description: units in which sensor wavelengths are expressed

element.name: VectSpatRep
element.label: Uzaysal Vektör Simgesi
element.description: veri setindeki vektör objenin bilgisi

element.name: vertDatum
element.label: Dikey datum
element.description: en üst yüksekli ile en alt yükselik bilgisinin ölçüldüğü merkezin bilgisi

element.name: vertEle
element.label: Dikey element
element.description: provides vertical component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: VertExtent
element.label: Dikey kapsam
element.description: vertical domain of dataset

element.name: vertMaxVal
element.label: Üst değer
element.description: highest vertical extent contained in the dataset

element.name: vertMinVal
element.label: Alt değer
element.description: lowest vertical extent contained in the dataset

element.name: vertUoM
element.label: Vertical Unit of measure
element.description: vertical units used for vertical extent information. Examples: metres, feet, millimetres, hectopascals

element.name: voiceNum
element.label: Telefon
element.description: telephone number by which individuals can speak to the responsible organization or individual

element.name: westBL
element.label: West bound longitude
element.description: western-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: zone
element.label: Grid Zone Belirteci
element.description: unique identifier for 100,000 metre grid zone
